DOC.detailed_description: The study evaluate effectiveness financial incentive improve maintenance weight loss . The investigator propose 2-arm randomized control trial 258 participant lose least 5 kgs weight loss program randomize one following : 1 ) daily weigh-ins weekly feedback , 2 ) daily weigh-ins , weekly feedback , weekly escalate lottery-based financial incentive . Study participant obese volunteer recruit major community-based weight loss program ( Weight Watchers ) , lose least 5kg 4-6 month prior enrol study . Upon enrollment , participant active online membership Weight Watchers . Among participant , follow assess : 1 . Assess effectiveness escalate lottery reward , relative control group , maintenance weight loss ensue 6 month ( Phase I ) ; 2.The degree weight loss maintain intervention group relative usual care 6 month follow cessation intervention ( Phase II ) . During Phase I , incentive provide study participant ( escalate lottery arm ) first 6 month participant follow 6 month examine effect follow cessation incentive .
